name: HMMT 2025
description: Harvard-MIT Mathematics Tournament 2025 individual round problems covering algebra, combinatorics, geometry, and number theory.

metrics.name: accuracy
metrics.definition: Percentage of problems solved exactly with correct final answer

test_method: Deliver each question verbatim; evaluate on final numeric or algebraic answer as specified. Multi-part questions should be split into independent items for scoring.
notes: Some problems expect proofs; define whether short answers or full derivations are required. Document parsing heuristics for symbolic answers.
